channel.title: State Park on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in State Park on MyThinkPond

item.title: Lessons learnt from camping in the midst of a flood
item.description: This past weekend when Ellicott City was hit with the worst storm in over hundred years, we ended up camping out in Rocky Gap State Park. Last year when we were out camping it rained a little and I had no tarp below my tent. So as soon as I got home last season, I ordered a tarp and had it ready this time. But some lessons are learned the hard way.
